reviewText: A tragic, but passionate, love story. The photography and casting are great. It's one of those films than you gotta watch with someone special to you, as it will strenghten the bond.

This is one of those movies that has a haunting feel that draws you in, even though you aren't sure where the plot will end up. The plot is intentionally somewhat circular in nature. A number of the characters have a sad, resigned nature about them. It's almost as if the whole movie is about how happiness is just beyond reach. This is the kind of movie you aren't quite sure about the first time you see it, but which leaves you with enough memorable images that you want to see it again.

Tuve la suerte de poder conseguir esta pelicula en DVD. Una magnifica historia escrita de manera muy inteligente y con enfasis en la imagen por sobre las palabras. una historia de amor para identificarse. Muy recomendable.
